Title: top Chef: Cooking Up Instructional Greatness with Fun PD
Description:
Allison Starling talks about a fun "PD Event" she plans for her school that makes innovation fun. She discusses how she styles this event and what teachers learn.

www.coolcatteacher.com/e401

Sponsor: Take the Goodbye, Teacher Tired Challenge: 5 Days to Doing Fewer things Better by Angela Watson. Go to www.coolcatteacher.com/challenge  and join.
